W02_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: Beyond the door you found Pulchra, a world inhabited by colorful witches. They are facing the Calamity, and if you hope to acquire a spirit's power you'll need to watch over them as they fight it.

W02_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_001_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_001_DETAIL.text: You found an entirely unknown world on the other side of the door. You'll need to rely on the Emerald Wave to figure out what you're supposed to do here.

W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_000_DETAIL.text: Better to claim a weak spirit than no spirit at all. No shame in picking an opponent you know you can beat!

W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_100_DETAIL.text: When comparing your strength against the spirits you could claim, this one seems about right. Nothing good comes from pushing yourself too hard, after all!

W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_200_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_200_DETAIL.text: What was the point in venturing into the Heavens if you don't claim the strongest of all spirits? The challenge is such a thrill!

W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_300_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_300_DETAIL.text: A most sinister spirit awaits your challenge. Make sure you're well prepared before engaging it.

W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_999_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_999_DETAIL.text: Even the most sinister spirit in this world doesn't seem like such a big deal. Now let's get this over with.

W02_EVAR_MIDO_AQUEDUCT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_MIDO_AQUEDUCT_000_DETAIL.text: The entrance to an underground waterway that leads to the black castle.

W02_EVAR_MIDO_AQUEDUCT_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_MIDO_AQUEDUCT_010_DETAIL.text: The entrance to an underground waterway that leads to the black castle.

W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLACK_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLACK_000_DETAIL.text: A castle that's home to the Black Witch. Sadly, the path there is blocked by a lake of ice-cold water. Is there no other way to reach it?

W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLUE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLUE_000_DETAIL.text: A castle within a great tree that's covered in the fresh, eternal vegetation of spring. Home to the sagely Blue Witch.

W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLUE_000_BUTTON.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_MIDO_BLUE_000_BUTTON.text: Enter the Tree of the Forever Young

W02_EVAR_MIDO_RED_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_MIDO_RED_000_DETAIL.text: A perpetually smoldering castle of hellfire. Home to the sagely Red Witch.

W02_EVAR_MIDO_YELLOW_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_MIDO_YELLOW_000_DETAIL.text: A windmill that's home to the Yellow Witch. It spins even without wind, allowing it to grind grain nonstop.

W02_EVAR_MIDO_WHITE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_MIDO_WHITE_000_DETAIL.text: A castle constructed of gold and marble. Home to the sagely White Witch.

W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_MIDO_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_DETAIL.text: A tower of brilliant light that sits at the center of the world. This is your next destination.

W02_EVAR_MIDO_LASTBATTLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_MIDO_LASTBATTLE_000_DETAIL.text: Your final task as the Watcher awaits, and once you step into the Brilliant Tower, there's no going back. That said, you also sense a spirit's power for...some reason. What's going on here?

W02_EVAR_MIDO_LASTBATTLE_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_MIDO_LASTBATTLE_010_DETAIL.text: Your final task as the Watcher awaits. Once you step into the Brilliant Tower, there's no going back.

W02_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_100_DETAIL.text: The Calamity has engulfed all, leaving the Witchdom of Pulchra silent as the grave. There is nothing left for you in this world.

W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_310_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_MIDO_MOKU_310_DETAIL.text: It might be best to acquire a spirit's power before fulfilling your duty as the Watcher. There seems to be a sinister wood spirit here.

W02_EVAR_MIDO_KA_310_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_MIDO_KA_310_DETAIL.text: It might be best to acquire a spirit's power before fulfilling your duty as the Watcher. There seems to be a sinister fire spirit here.

W02_EVAR_MIDO_SUI_310_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_MIDO_SUI_310_DETAIL.text: It might be best to acquire a spirit's power before fulfilling your duty as the Watcher. There seems to be a sinister water spirit here.

W02_EVAR_MIDO_KIN_310_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_MIDO_KIN_310_DETAIL.text: It might be best to acquire a spirit's power before fulfilling your duty as the Watcher. There seems to be a sinister metal spirit here.

W02_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_DETAIL.text: It might be best to acquire a spirit's power before fulfilling your duty as the Watcher. No shame in picking an opponent you know you can beat!

W02_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_100_DETAIL.text: It might be best to acquire a spirit's power before fulfilling your duty as the Watcher. This one seems to be about the right level for you.

W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_SCAN_MIDO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_DETAIL.text: This world seems to be home to a variety of spirits. But before you could look for them you were caught by the Blue Witch, Lita.

W02_SCAN_MIDO_LITA_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_SCAN_MIDO_LITA_000_DETAIL.text: There are witches you need to watch over all around Pulchra. While you can go where you like, the red areas are in the most danger.
